Argent Judgment.name: Argent Judgment
Argent Judgment.flavor: With a vicious attack, the frost on your scales and weapon freezes your opponent in places and locks its wrath upon you.
Argent Judgment.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.

Breath of Sephitherax.name: Breath of Sephitherax
Breath of Sephitherax.flavor: You inhale deeply and blow out a frigid breath that turns the very bones of your enemies to ice.
Breath of Sephitherax.attack: Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity + 9 vs. Reflex
Breath of Sephitherax.onHit: 4d6 + Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Dexterity modifier cold damage, and the target is restrained (save ends).
Breath of Sephitherax.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.

Defend the Fallen.name: Defend the Fallen
Defend the Fallen.flavor: The cries of your ally call your attention and you rush to defend him or her.
Defend the Fallen.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you falls prone or becomes unconscious
Defend the Fallen.effect: You move twice your speed to a square adjacent to the fallen ally. Both you and the ally gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
